remarks: If the target space is Hausdorff, a continuous extension is a function (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Dec-2017.)
statement:
cnextfrel.1 $e |- C = U. J $.
cnextfrel.2 $e |- B = U. K $.
cnextfun $p |- ( ( ( J e. Top /\ K e. Haus ) /\ ( F : A --> B /\ A C_ C ) ) -> Fun ( ( J CnExt K ) ` F ) ) $.
